name: Adventure Society
description: A global organization that manages monster hunting and exploration tasks. They rank members by their capability.

name: Magic Society
description: A collective of magic users dedicated to the research of essences, awakening stones, and magical phenomena. Often rivals with the Adventure Society for influence.

name: Order of the Shield
description: A militant order focused on the protection of the innocent and maintaining peace.

name: Mercenary Guild
description: A loose association of soldiers of fortune. While less regulated than the Adventure Society, they handle contracts that others won't touch.

name: Church of the Healer
description: Dedicated to healing and recovery. They operate hospitals and clinics across Pallimustus.

name: House Remore
description: A powerful noble family known for their strict discipline and high standards.

name: Cult of the Reaper
description: A forbidden organization worshipping death and entropy.

name: The Iron Syndicate
description: A clandestine criminal organization that controls the black market and illicit trade.

name: The Verdant Circle
description: A group of druids and rangers dedicated to preserving nature and stopping the encroachment of civilization.

name: The Silent Hand
description: A secretive guild of assassins and spies who sell their services to the highest bidder.
